name: Arkham 2043
description:
Something is wrong with this city. The foul disease that grips these streets has always been here, but tonight this nameless evil threatens to consume all.

In the year 2043, lead a team of investigators across the city of Arkham, Massachusetts. Uncover foul plots, bring light to the shadows of back alleys, and unveil the mask of this long-storied city.

Prototype game created for Ludum Dare 43 (review page)

Combat is turn-based. Each investigator has multiple abilities they can use to defend themselves from the creatures of the night. Select abilities for each investigator, and click attack to resolve all the enemy and investigator actions.

Each ability uses energy tokens. Each turn, 6 energy tokens are pulled from a box that can be used for those abilities. The box contains tokens determined by your investigator's stats.
